title: Huge Music Library
cleaned_text: Live Broadcasting Get closer to your favourite artist and their hits in JOOX Live. Sorry, JOOX is not available in this is now available in Thailand, Malaysia, Indonesia and Myanmar. [Privacy Policy](https://www.joox.com/en_my/app/privacy_policy.html) It's the FREE music player app with more than 40 million songs from all over the world. Enjoy social music experience with Karaoke, Live video group chat rooms, and trending short videos Now available on Mobile App (IOS and Android), Desktop App, joox.com, Android TV and Google Nest in Hong Kong, Thailand, Malaysia, Indonesia, Myanmar. Instantly access streaming more than 40 million songs from all over the world. Find playlists recommended by us, with songs to fit your mood. Customise your playlists with your favourite songs and tracks for every occasion. Get closer to your favourite artist and their hits in JOOX Live.
